id.description: Identifier which will be used as event target id.

template.description: <semantic-link iri='http://www.researchspace.org/resource/ThinkingFrames' urlqueryparam-view='help' urlqueryparam-resource-iri='[[resolvePrefix "Help:TemplatingSystem"]]' urlqueryparam-custom-label='Templating system'>Template</semantic-link> that will be rendered with data passed as context variables.
